about.text2: Blitz é um aplicativo gratuito e de código aberto sob a
about.text5: Esta é uma carteira Bitcoin Lightning autocustodial. A Blitz não tem acesso aos seus fundos. Se você perder sua frase semente, poderá perder seus fundos.
about.text12: A Blitz usa o protocolo Spark. Spark é um
about.text14: onde os operadores Spark atualizam o estado da propriedade do Bitcoin fora da cadeia da blockchain
about.text15: permitindo transferências rápidas, de custo baixo e sem ceder a custódia dos fundos.

displayOptions.text6: Por favor, reconecte-se à internet para mudar a denominação
displayOptions.text12: Deslize para a direita na tela principal para ler um código QR — esteja você navegando em Contatos, Carteira ou na Página inicial.

fastPay.text1: Erro ao inserir o valor, tente novamente.
fastPay.text5: A função pagamento rápido permite que você pague instantaneamente faturas abaixo de um limite especificado, sem precisar confirmar o pagamento.

seedPhrase.header: Guarde esta frase em um lugar seguro e protegido
seedPhrase.qrWarning:
Are you sure you want to show this QR Code?

Scanning your seed is convenient, but be sure you're using a secure and trusted device. This helps keep your wallet safe.
seedPhrase.showSeedWarning: Tem certeza de que deseja mostrar sua frase semente?

crashReporting.descriptionText:
Os dados de falhas nos ajudam a melhorar a estabilidade e o desempenho do aplicativo.

Quando ocorre uma falha, as informações do dispositivo que são registradas automaticamente incluem:

• Sistema operacional: versão do sistema operacional, orientação do dispositivo e status do jailbreak
• Detalhes do dispositivo: modelo, orientação e RAM disponível
• Informações sobre o travamento: data do travamento e versão do aplicativo

resetWallet.dataDeleteHeader: Select data to delete from this device.
resetWallet.dataDeleteDesc: Any option that is selected will be removed forever. If your seed is forgotten, you WILL lose your funds.
resetWallet.seedAndPinOpt: Delete seed phrase and pin from my device
resetWallet.localData: Delete locally stored data from my device
resetWallet.localStorageError: Not able to delete local stored information
resetWallet.secureStorageError: Not able to delete secure stored information

sparkLrc20.balanceError: Your current wallet balance is {{balance}}. Blitz adds a {{fee}} fee to all BTKN payments. Make sure you have some Bitcoin in your wallet to send tokens.
sparkLrc20.title: Spark Settings
sparkLrc20.sliderDesc:
BTKN is Spark’s native token. Enabling BTKN allows you send and receive tokens on the Spark network.

Blitz is a Bitcoin focused wallet. We do not promote or endorse the use of tokens. This feature exists because we believe users should have the freedom to use the technology they want to use.

Blitz also applies a {{fee}} fee to all token transactions, with 20% of that fee donated to support open-source Bitcoin development.

viewRoostockSwaps.noSwapsMessage: You have no saved Roostock swaps

viewAllLiquidSwaps.swapStartedMessage: The swap has started. It may take 10–20 seconds for the payment to show up.
viewAllLiquidSwaps.balanceError: Current liquid balance is {{balance}} but the minimum swap amount is {{swapAmount}}
viewAllLiquidSwaps.swapMessage:
Blitz Wallet will try to swap your Liquid funds into Spark when you first load the app or when you receive Liquid payments.

However, in some cases a swap might be missed. To move these funds into Spark manually, just click the Swap button below.

notifications.mainToggleDesc: As notificações permitem que você fique informado sobre eventos e atualizações importantes que acontecem no aplicativo.

nostrHome.nip5Desc: Quickly verify your Nostr identity using Blitz.
nostrHome.nwcDesc: Connect your Blitz Wallet to apps using Nostr.

fiatCurrency.title: Moeda de exibição
fiatCurrency.saveCurrencyError: Não foi possível salvar a moeda selecionada, tente novamente.

feeInformation.description:
A Blitz Wallet oferece produtos gratuitos e de código aberto para a comunidade Bitcoin. 

Para ajudar a manter o projeto sustentável, adicionamos uma pequena taxa de transação a cada pagamento.

Veja como essas taxas são distribuídas:

nip5.nameLengthError: Name must be less than 60 characters
nip5.regexError: Name can only include letters or numbers.
nip5.nameConfirmationMessage: NIP-05 added successfully! Please note that it may take up to 24 hours to appear, as the list is updated once per day.
nip5.title: Nip5 Verification
nip5.desc: Nip5 turns your long Npub into a small email-like address, similar to a lightning address.

errors.invalidPubKey: Invalid pubkey: must be a non-empty string
errors.invlaidFormat: Invalid pubkey format: must be either 64-character hex string or npub

createNWCAccount.title: Create Account

hasNoAccounts.wanringMessage:
To send money from your Nostr Connect wallet, you’ll first need to add funds—either by receiving money or transferring from your main wallet.

 You can transfer funds from your main wallet to NWC in the account settings page.

noNotifications.wanringMessage:
In order to use Nostr Wallet Connect you need to have push notification for Nostr Wallet Connect enabled.

Please enable push notifications in the settings and try again.

showSeedPage.wanringMessage:
To keep your wallet safe, Nostr Wallet Connect creates a separate seed phrase from your main wallet's seed.

This wallet uses the second derivation path and can always be recovered using your main wallet's seed.

If you're not tech-savvy and unsure about recovering the wallet address, please write down this seed phrase.

receiveBtcPage.onchainFeeMessage:
On-chain payments have a network fee and 0.1% Spark fee.

If you send money to yourself, you’ll pay the network fee twice — once to send it and once to claim it.

If someone else sends you money, you’ll only pay the network fee once to claim it.
receiveBtcPage.liquidFeeMessage:
Liquid payments need to be swapped into Spark.

This process includes a lockup fee of about {{fee}}, a claim fee of around {{claimFee}}, and a 0.1% service fee from Boltz based on the amount you’re sending.
receiveBtcPage.rootstockFeeMessage:
Rootstock payments need to be swapped into Spark.

This process includes a lockup fee of about {{fee}}, and a 0.1% service fee from Boltz based on the amount you’re sending.

technicalTransactionDetails.noInformationLabel: {{item}} is not shown since this payment was restored from history or used a zero amount invoice.
technicalTransactionDetails.privacyMessage: To preserve the {{type}} privacy, all other information is hidden.

errormessages.giftCardExpiration: Gift cards can only be recovered for 7 days after they are sent. If this app is deleted or local storage is cleared after that time, your gift cards will be lost. Be sure to save the claim links or gift card codes somewhere safe.
